data.name: Grand Strokers
data.detailed_description:
In this horror-themed comedic RPG, you are "Hero" that tries to stop a horned-up vampire named "The Grand Stroker" and his electrifying friends. You will fight enemies, level up and get progressively stronger tiered gear, take on dungeons and hand-drawn bosses until the final show-down where you will fight the "The Grand Stroker" himself in the Grand Stroker's Castle. Will you survive --- or will he suck your life-forces dry?

The game features :

•Hilarious names, places and ideas that will literally say "Are you kidding me?!"

•Hand drawn bosses from Cesare, the legendary Italian illustrator from NecroCatic Games!!

•11 dungeons, we think (it's still being made).

•Traditional turn-based combat with new and clearly superior Retro Sideview Combat!

•Some BANGING Music by Alexander Nakarada.

•Ideas from the same programmer and studio that brought you such classic games as "The Tower of Wowers" and "CarsFuckingDragons".

•A few poorly recorded voice lines of dialogue that you will barely notice!

AND MORE!!!

data.short_description: Comedic Horror RPG / JRPG that will leave you breathless with a sticky keyboard --- or offended! No holds barred, no filters. Pure unadulterated sexiness monster orgy goodness!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 / OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 Display

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains swear words that someone could find offensive. Big bad swear words...

The game is punny and contains a ton of jokes about masturbation and sex too! 

All characters, enemies and bosses are over the legal age and have consent to be in the game and participate in LAWFUL sexual positions and situations.
